title: x/blog: protocol relative urls in atom feed breaks links in rss readers
body:
The links in the http://blog.golang.org/feed.atom feed contains protocol relative urls and those are not very well understood in many RSS readers.

For example in NetNewsWrite this link:
//blog.golang.org/errors-are-values

Becomes this in Chrome:
file://blog.golang.org/errors-are-values

I think we should include protocols in the links until RSS readers become smarter.
